name: Nomad Academy
slogan: Programs to get people the direction & entrepreneurial skills for careers they'll love
description:
Nomad Academy brings driven individuals together to create entrepreneurial careers, in inspiring locations around the world.

We do it by combining travel, a select community and entrepreneurial learning (through workshops, coaching & online courses).

WHY?
So many of us work in conventional careers that don’t give us meaning and hold us back from achieving all that we could. We do it because everyone else does, because it’s the safer route, because “that’s the way life is”.

Most people settle for that. But a few don’t.

Nomad Academy was founded to bring together those few brave enough to pursue a meaningful life and become all that they could be – despite the risks and hardships involved.

team.name: Andrea Emanuelli
team.bioHtml: Italian. MSc in Tech Entrepreneurship & BEng Electronics. Two-time founder. COO @Nomad Academy

team.name: Harry Verma
team.bioHtml: Founder @Nomad Academy , experience in startups and personal growth events.

team.title: Marketing Director
team.name: Jesse Jan Driessen
team.bioHtml: Former Director of Digital Marketing Strategy at BANDUJO. Proven experience with SEM, SMM, SEO, CRO, UX and Growth. Recently moved to Amsterdam from NYC.

team.title: Experiences Director
team.name: Steven Ebbers
team.bioHtml: Leadership & Program Director, Workshop Facilitator, Coach, Msc Psychology & Professional Athlete.

jobs.title: Head of Content
jobs.description:
Grow our brand – through creating strategies and content that get people on the path to careers that make them feel alive again!

You’ll use your passion for storytelling and excellent writing/video skills to help craft our story and create content our audience loves.

WHAT YOU'LL DO:

• Create great videos and blogs that capture what we do on programs, and how people's lives change once they're in our alumni community.
• Experimenting with different formats and channels to reach our target audience.
• Capturing & sharing the stories of our alumni around the world through interviews. Then empowering them to share content themselves and turning them into brand-ambassadors.
• Owning our tone of voice and making sure we stay on message. You’ll help review content for clarity and brand consistency across the company.


SKILLS NEEDED
- video editing & production
- writing compelling copy with verve and emotion
- some knowledge of behavioural psychology behind storytelling
- A history of brand-building success, ideally working in consumer-facing startups or experiences.


If our mission resonates with you, and you have the skills needed – get in touch! We're a young startup with a small team and massive ambition; to own the space of purposeful career changes, through our intense experiences.


This role is for you if you're ready to be part of something that's growing fast, to get people into careers that shape the world, and to have the most intense "job" in your life.
